summary: Automates Winterrun Breezehome by adding an enchantement table, some additional storage boxes, and crafting abilities. The boxes allow for automatic storage of potions, scrolls, crafting supplies, alchemy ingredients, and books. Linked to purchased decorations.
descriptionHtml:
Automates Winterrun Breezehome by adding an enchantement table and some additional storage boxes. The boxes allow for automatic storage of potions, scrolls, crafting supplies, alchemy ingredients, and books. Linked to purchased decorations.

Added another button that allows for crafting inside the home: skyforge, grindstone, workbench, tanning rack, and Smelter

Added a spell called \"Sol\'s Recall\" - Alteration spell to translocate you to and from Breezehome. Cast from without Breezehome, sets your location and teleports you to Breezehome. Cast within Breezehome teleports you back to your mark. 

Note - This could possibly cause problems like broken quests so use wisely. Spell Tome is in the locker marked Library
author: WhatIsSol
